sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { Header } from "../../common/Header"; import { MDBBtn, MDBFreeBird, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardText, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBInput, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBEdgeHeader, MDBCardTitle, MDBProgress, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBView, MDBMask } from "mdbreact"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import "./style.css" import Charts from "react-apexcharts"; import { Chart } from "../common/VulnChart" import { CategoryChart } from "../common/VulnCatChart" import { fetchData } from '../../services/apiConfig' export const Home = (props: any) => { const [dashboardKPI, setDashboardKPI] = useState({"trial_days_remaining":15,"metrics":{vapt: {categories: {} , count: {criticalCount: 0, highCount: 0, lowCount: 0}}}}); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); useEffect(() => { fetchData('dashboard', 'GET').then((res: any) => { console.log(res) console.log(res.trial_days_remaining) setDashboardKPI(res) let sortable: any = []; for(const [key, value] of Object.entries(dashboardKPI.metrics.vapt.categories) ) { console.log(`${key}: ${value}`); sortable.push([key, value]); } sortable.sort((a: any, b: any) => { return b[1] - a[1]; }); console.log(sortable) const pentestSeries = [dashboardKPI.metrics.vapt.count.criticalCount, dashboardKPI.metrics.vapt.count.highCount, dashboardKPI.metrics.vapt.count.lowCount] const pentestSeriesCategory = [(sortable[0] as any)[0], (sortable[1] as any)[0], (sortable[2] as any)[0]] const pentestSeriesCategoryCount = [(sortable[0] as any)[1], (sortable[1] as any)[1], (sortable[2] as any)[1]] console.log(pentestSeriesCategory) }) }, []); if (token === null || token === undefined || token.length < 0) { return } return ( <> <>
Penetration test

This pentest is an authorized simulated cyberattack on a computer system, performed to evaluate the security of the system by identifying vulnerabilities enabling a full risk assessment to be completed.



<>
Risk by severity and category: Services

Watcher keps eye on all your cloud services, monitors organisation assets at scale, regularly checks for misconfigurations for potential hacks and exploits.



<>
Risk by severity and category: Domains

Watcher checks on all your domains, monitors organisation assets at scale, regularly checks for misconfigurations for potential hacks and exploits.

) }
